text: Tumi ki tabe take laksya karecha ye tara kheyala-khusike tara upasyarupe grahana kareche? Ara allah jene-sune'i take pathabhrasta hate diyechena, ara tini mohara mere diyechena tara srabanendriye o tara hrdaye, ara tara darsanendriyera upare tini baniye diyechena ekati parda. Kaje'i allahâ€Œra pare ara ke take patha dekhabe? Tabu'o ki tomara manoyoga debe na
